type.name: EMA
type.summary: Exponential Moving Average (EMA) of the Close price. See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.

type.name: DEMA
type.summary: Double Exponential Moving Average (DEMA) of the Close price. See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
type.returns: Time series of Double EMA values.

type.name: TEMA
type.summary: Triple Exponential Moving Average (TEMA) of the Close price. Note: TEMA is often confused with the alternative TRIX oscillator. See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
type.returns: Time series of Triple EMA values.
